articles.author: Samuel Luckhurst
articles.title: Portugal coach discusses team news amid possible Bruno Fernandes recall vs Belgium at Euro 2020 - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Bruno Fernandes was dropped for Portugal's 2-2 draw with France in midweek and the European champions face Belgium tonight.
articles.content:
Portugal coach Fernando Santos is open to recalling Bruno Fernandes for their round-of-16 tie with Belgium in the European Championship tonight. 
Fernandes was widely criticised for his displays in … [+1403 chars]
